title: Sentient Jet President: The Rise of Private Jet Aviation
description: Alan Walsh, President of Sentient Jet, says travelers are flying bigger and longer, valuing experiential travel and enjoying the holiday experience. He speaks with Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld on “The Close.” (Source: Bloomberg)
content: Alan Walsh, President of Sentient Jet, says travelers are flying bigger and longer, valuing experiential travel and enjoying the holiday experience. He speaks with Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld on “The Close.” (Source: Bloomberg)
